segments.text: The water waste from that sink is disgusting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just pouring out, flooding the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman dries dishes like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the mess, soaking her shoe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the kids are climbing for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks filthy from use.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's hand is deep in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Probably crumbs everywhere from their grabbing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands there, expecting her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole sneaky operation is gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden looks clean, unlike this slop inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're ignoring the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR
